website_summaries.verdict: Easy, simple, no fuss slipper that keeps your feet warm and has good durability.
pros: Design makes them easy to slip on
Sheepskin lining provides comfort and warmth
Durable construction makes them work for everyday wear
cons: Finding the right size can be difficult, and they don't have much arch support

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Product
customer_reviews.text: These are not Uggs. Fur quality, stitching, and sole material are all poor compared to a genuine Ugg slipper. Also, the slippers weigh much different, the fake ugg being much lighter. I have posted images of this fake ugg next to the real brand (Fake images on left). Feeling the fur and sole clearly gives it away. However, the packaging is identical. The suede on the real ugg also feels so much better. This product is advertised as the true ugg brand even charging a similar price as the retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Forrestn94

customer_reviews.title: Fake UGGs.
customer_reviews.text: These are not real UGGs. The sole was so thin. They are not UGG Australia. These should not be sold for 85.00. They are cheap and not real UGG. This makes me second guess buying from Amazon right now.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic? Images don’t match the product.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in and they are missing the word “Australia” on the side of the boot and on the tag on the sole. I looked on the actual UGG website to compare them and they appear to also supposed to have the word on them. But these don’t (see pics). Seems fishy. Will be returning them and buying from UGG website. Same price and at least I’m not getting something different from the picture images.
customer_reviews.author: serina M.

customer_reviews.title: These flat out suck
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that this product is clearly a knock off being sold for the price of authentic Ugg Boots. I ordered a size 8 as I’m always a size 8 in authentic Uggs and these slip right off my feet. They’re made in Vietnam. Returning as soon as I buy the real ones in a store. Shame on you Amazon for allowing inauthentic retailers.
customer_reviews.author: brittany hemmingsen

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable, no padding in sole.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I leave one star is the price for the product you get. There is no padding in the sole whatsoever. It feels like your standing on wool covered plywood. I was so disappointed after all the good reviews. If you want something comfortable to walk in, these aren't it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL UGGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT REAL UGGS! I didn’t read reviews before I received the slippers, I go on here to leave my review that they aren’t real and apparently I’m not the only one that noticed. Not real, not comfortable, not supportive. Please, spend your money on authentic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Imposter uggs!
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be fake. Returning immediately. They are a great replica but the fur is a dead give away, not nearly as soft as real uggs. These didn’t even come in an UGG box’s, which was the first red flag!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maher

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers! They are comfortable temperature (feet don’t get too hot) and they can easily be warm inside and outdoors if you have to make a quick run to the store. I wouldn’t recommend wearing them outside in the rain or bad weather as they’re not meant to get wet and don’t have a to. of arch support. Also- as others have stated, the sole is quite thin so if you plan to stand for a long time and have arch issues, you may consider getting a different style with a thicker sole/more support. For me, these work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Hthomas

customer_reviews.title: Fake and False Advertising. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a Christmas gift, and sending them right back. Don’t waste your money on fakes when you can get the real deal straight from Ugg for the same price! They are missing the registered trademark all around, and like other reviews have mentioned, the Australia too. We compared them to real Uggs, and it’s evident these are wannabes. What you see in the picture is not what you get.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed with UGG...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the lining of the shoe. It was very thin and not like others I have bought from UGG. Not as much warmth as expected and seems to be cheapened. The shoe fit loose as expected since they cut back on the fleece fur. The color and construction is great, but not the shoe I was accustomed to. For the price, it should have been made better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo

customer_reviews.title: lovely slippers
customer_reviews.text: i think the chocolate is a nice color. i wear a 7 in any other ugg boots that i own and i got the 7 in these house shoes as well. i found them to be cute with my robe. i thought that they were comfortable right away except for the annoying tag that is sewn into the heel area of the footbed. needless to say, i removed it with a small scissors and a tweezers—made all the difference. i also removed the other annoying tag that is inside.
customer_reviews.author: babeemonsta

customer_reviews.title: Save ur $
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Pics speak for the quality of like new I received.
customer_reviews.author: Blonderoxy

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper, but they run extremely small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a siblings b-day, she is a size 6 , so I said what can go wrong with a size 7 one size up should surely be enough as they run small. But nope it seems she needs a size 8 or 9 . And at the moment doesn't seem like Amazon has them in stock so we'll probably have to return it. But they are great looking slipper and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Myi

customer_reviews.title: They are too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8.5 arms this is my second pair of uggs. I ordered a 9 for comfort on my jacked up feet but these are just too small. I already wore then so I'm not returning them. Besides, my other much more comfortable, good fitting uggs are lost for the time being and I don't want to b without slippers for all those days waiting for a replacement. Anyway. Disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Made in Vietnam, not Australia 😖
customer_reviews.text: I picked the product with the photo that says Uggs Australia on the leather, as this is for an 18 yo step-granddaughter who cares about that type of prestige. Instead I got slippers made in Vietnam, and that is clearly labeled on the box. Maybe she won’t notice. Unless the description says that we will receive a similar product, I think we should be shipped the product in the photo that we think we are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: basically an optimist

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in October and they are falling apart already. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm scuff slipper, no arch support though
customer_reviews.text: Typical Ugg 'shoe' with no arch support. Only a little disappointed that there is almost no sole, just a thin flat piece of leather. Not sure how long the sole will hold up. But it's only a slipper. Next time I will order a more substantial slipper that can be worn outside to get the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. I have been an Ugg fan forever and have owned various different styles of their slippers but my wife had never owned a pair. We are big slipper-wearers so when she was needing to replace her then-current pair, I suggested she finally try a pair out. They arrived today and she is in love. They are warm and soft and durable. In my experience with slippers, there are none that hold a candle to Ugg with regard to comfort and durability. If you are concerned about them being more pricey than other brands, rest assured the initial investment will pay off and they will remain your favorite slippers for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, was greeted with huge smiles - it was a real winner. The fleece is luxurious and the suede is so soft, really these are great slide-in slippers. I took the advice of other buyers and went one size up, and that worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up - nice and soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ordered these babies half a size bigger. At first it seemed like they were going to be too small and my foot was RIGHT at the edge of the slipper. They eventually gave in a little bit and now fit more comfortably but I still wish I had more wiggle room. Other than the sizing, they are super warm and comfortable, and feel really good to lounge around the house.
customer_reviews.author: krol

customer_reviews.title: TOO Small
customer_reviews.text: Ad says free returns for any reason. This slipper was too small even when ordered a size larger than normal. Then when I returned, it cost me $6.00 to return. FREE? Right!
customer_reviews.author: dougbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful comfort for the feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers and pretty much anything else Uggs make! I have two different pairs of Uggs slippers and I go back and forth to them each day as I work from my home and they are my work attire! Love them, love the quality. The price is not so bad for what you are getting. I found them to be my true size so I would not recommend downsizing or upsizing as some suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Francie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Covid comfy
customer_reviews.text: I already had an old pair (same style) that were pretty worn at the heel with missing sheepskin. Still comfortable but decided at Day 60 I needed a treat for myself that didn’t involve food. Very happy with everything. They are authentic UGG.
customer_reviews.author: boomchick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 8.5 in shoes, and upsized to a 9 versus 8 with these. They are perfect. Not too big and not too small. They are super warm and comfortable to wear around the house and to slide on when my feet are a little chilly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ritch

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife and she loves them! This is her second pair of Uggs and definitely her favorite. She says they fit great (she normally wears a 10 1/2, so I got an 11). The half size larger is taken up by the fur lining,which she says feel amazing. She’s happy, so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Beav

customer_reviews.title: Best slipper ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 usually but I ordered a 10 after reading other reviews and already knowing Uggs fit a bit snug! They are perfect! Even with socks on, they fit great! And backless stuff is sometimes awkward and clunky but these form to your feet and feel amazing! And although they are backless, they are still warm without wearing socks!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: 2 different looking slippers
customer_reviews.text: My slippers look like 2 different shoes, the left one is fluffy & full & the right slipper has half the fluff & it's sparse, if I knew how these were going to look, I'd have bought a much cheaper pair instead of the ugg brand, apparently you're paying for the brand name, not quality
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy from a reputable vendor
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are great, but the pair I received look like they were manufactured years apart and from different locations. One is more voluminous, while the other is more feathery. Terrible. I would recommend ordering from a reputable vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these less then a year and they do not look good anymore. The fur is no longer soft but very dull and almost matted. The sole is extremely thin and uncomfortable; and the heel is almost completely worn out. I’ve never owned a pair of Ugg’s before but I’m very disappointed in these. Don’t feel they’ll last much longer
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. She absolutely loves them. After wearing them for about a week, They are starting to conform to her feet. She said that they are incredibly comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Baji

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe these are Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Uggs but these slippers...ugh. First, in Uggs I'm usually a size 7 but they were a bit small. I returned them for an 8 and was excited when I received them. I wore them around the house maybe for a total of 4 hours the first day. The next day I noticed that they were cracking along the seam on the top of the shoe. Look at the pics I posted. I'm very disappointed in these slippers. I can't believe these are Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: aprilaz2003

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I've purchased these for my daughter, she loves them, they wear well and she asked for them again, they lasted a year, with daily use, she does wear them outside on occasion but they held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these slippers. This is my second pair, the first lasted me about 6 years. There are a few differenses between these and my old ones, the sole used to be made from leather, now it's some sort of rubbery, non slip material. (I prefer the leather, but get why they made the change. I'll get used to it) These slippers are always the perfect temperature for my feet. I love them and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Wells

customer_reviews.title: Liked the old pair better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my partner - as her old pair of UGG's had given out. These did not have the slightly elevated heels of her previous pair and it feels like she is walking barefoot. The version with the elevated heel is more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: They felt stiff. The soles were very thin. I didn’t care for how they felt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Once you've had UGG slippers, you’re spoiled and can never go back to regular slippers. I LOVE these! They are warm and comfortable and cozy. The softness just molds to your feet and they last forever! To me, they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: PDR

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I truly think these are great! Nice, warm, and comfy. I didn’t like them the first three days, because the plush fabric near my toes sort of gathered and felt weird, but when it settled into place after about a week, they feel perfect. I do recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Nita B

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears slippers every day and this is her first pair of UGGs as she is cheap :-) I got these for her for Christmas and she will never go back to cheap slippers again. She loves these and actually wants another back up pair, ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I'll begin this review by saying, I do not get paid for this or even get free stuff from amazon. Just a normal dad buying stuff online and writing honest reviews. I won't hold back on my review if it sucks and often update my reviews as time goes on. I hate buying something and finding out after it was a bad purchase and full of phony reviews. fit to size. match shoe size and order that. we went larger and it was too big the first time and had to exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Heli Chief

customer_reviews.title: Ugg cozy comfort, but this style offers little in the way of a supportive footbed.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ugg slippers. My favorite pair finally wore out, so I thought I'd give these a try. These are comfortable, but not as comfortable as my other pair which had a thicker, rubber footbed. In comparison, this style offers little in the way of support, which the supportive footbed was the very reason I was so attached to my old pair and never wanted to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvGoldDogs

customer_reviews.title: Lovely UGG Slipper...Simplicity, with What You Expect
customer_reviews.text: UGG is wonderful, plush, certainly, when they 1st arrive. When "plush" fades, so to speak, you still have a Fav, quality construction and comfort. It's not just the price that makes it "parting" a "pause". The UGG becomes a part of you, your comfort, your movement, your ....way, while about ...doing.
customer_reviews.author: MelDM

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel real
customer_reviews.text: These don’t feel like real Uggs. The seam across the top is breaking, the fur deals fake and they stink like synthetic wool after just a few wears unlike real wool. I wish I had looked into this sooner, I would have returned them, but since they were a gift from my husband I felt I had to give them a chance
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of Ugg scuffs and I have to say these are not the quality that I have gotten from other retail store purchases. The lining is very thin and the soles are basically plastic. I am very disappointed with this purchase. I feel like these are knock offs instead of the real thing. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! Super warm, cozy, and high quality. Not much for arch support, but I’m wearing them for for lounging comfort, not during activity.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMc

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and fuzzy. Love that it is the perfect "house shoe" with the hard sole. I normally wear a 10.5 in women, and my feet are a bit narrow. The women's size 11 fit my feet perfectly. Love these slippers!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Acheson

customer_reviews.title: ... in my five pair of UGG boots I have great cushioning this had nothing my heels hurt after five ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing don’t know if they are UGGs or not all I can say is in my five pair of UGG boots I have great cushioning this had nothing my heels hurt after five minutes wearing them had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wynn

customer_reviews.title: My third pair - I love these
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to slippers for around the house. I have worn through 2 pairs, this is my third. I love them. They are warm, easy to put on, and protect your feet. I wear them all year long. The fleece wicks away sweat. They clean up well. Uggs makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Powell

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was not as happy with these this time I bought the. The pair I got at Macys a few years ago had thicker lining. These are already flat and slipping off my feet. They are warm but not quite plush enough.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Tomeck

customer_reviews.title: Peeling Leather within the first few days
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid Ugg lover and purchase, anywhere from 1-3 Ugg products a year. But, I purchased these last December as a gift and within the first few days the seam on the top of the slipper began to peel away to reveal the dark brown leather underneath. I purchased this light colored slipper, so the pealing and cracking of the coating on the top leather seam of the slipper looks terrible. The slippers were only worn a few hours indoors, so I believe there must be a defect in the leather coating.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE HAWKINS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and my mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a gift for my mother for her birthday. She didn't know I prepared her a gift, she thought I forgot. She loved that surprise and she loves her furry sandal. She said it feels great not only soft and fluffy but also not stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Chen

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. They are so soft and keep my feet very warm. I step outside in them and because they have a rubberlike sole, my feet don't get wet. Tragically my husband threw them in the washer and so some of the fur got messed up but even after that and four years I wear these around every evening. Will be getting a replacement pair soon but not because they have worn out - just from the unfortunate washing machine episode.
customer_reviews.author: whitneyfinch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This product speaks for itself. I ordered a pair of Ugg slippers because I wanted something really nice, and it was nothing short of what I expected!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Backer

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy. Seems to run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I wear them all the time. I usually wear a 10.5 (which no one ever has), but the 10 fits well and my heel isn't hanging off the back. I have had them for about 2 months and they are wearing well. I have accidentally spilled something on them a few times, and I am able to wipe it off with a wet rag.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Mettler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I had these on my wish list for years but was hesitant to spend so much on a pair of slippers mainly because I have another pair of Ugg slippers that I didn't wear much and thought it would be the same with these. I'm so glad I decided to bite the bullet because these are amazing! So freaking comfortable and cozy, they have good traction and most important, they are easy to slip on and off which means I will actually wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Too big no support
customer_reviews.text: I would have ordered a 1/2 size smaller or even a size smaller they are to big and fall off my feet when I walk very disappointed for the price. These were recommended it I don’t like them at all
customer_reviews.author: Chesneyfan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable slippers
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and warm. This was absolutely well worth the price! I'm usually a 8.5 shoe size. Purchased size 9, fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Baila Hollender

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: love these slippers. I can wear them outside and inside which I love. They are especially great when the weather is very cold. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bush

customer_reviews.title: So comfy. THE slippers.
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers I have always wanted them and finally took the plunge and got them. I wear a 7 1/2 in sandals and heels 8 in tennis shoes and I ordered an 8. They fit perfect. Super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love my ugh slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are the best! I wear year round. They last at least 2 years even with daily use- indoor and outdoor around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood1985

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible quality. I cannot believe Ugg would put their name on these slippers. I’ve worn them for one day and they look horrible. Returning immediately. Picture was taken after one day of wear - they already look like they’re 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for years, I forget to take them off to put on shoes. The winter and fall are the best time for them. I think they are great
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect! Great quality! As soon as I get home from work I slip into these comfy slippers and ahhh such relief! I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable slippers! They honestly live up to the ugg ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these slippers for me for Christmas. They are the most comfortable slippers! They honestly live up to the ugg brand! I don't wear them outside just because I don't want to ruin them but they could be worn as a "clog". They are very warm too, don't really need socks
customer_reviews.author: Ricky U.

customer_reviews.title: SO nice
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy because Ugg quality is incredible and the fact I got these ON SALE well what can I say. Comfort is the key word here. They keep your feet warm but not uncomfortably hot. I could go on and on but I won’t.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Tarleton

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter specifically asked for these. She, in fact, sent us the link so we would get the correct ones. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UGG quality, very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Brand name and exactly what my wife wanted for Christmas from my daughter. UGG quality- nothing but good things.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie115

customer_reviews.title: Love UGG's but had to return because the size is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love UGG's but had to return because the size is really small. Had to order a size and a half larger. That's the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars, otherwise it would be 5 stars. Very expensive, but you get what you pay for and they are a very comfortable slipper. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hate to take these off.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these around the house and I always hate to take them off. They are comfy, warm (but not too hot) and they look good too. If you have really cold winters you may need the boot as your ankles might get cold...but being in California these work almost year-round.
customer_reviews.author: lolalafonda

customer_reviews.title: Love them! They are perfect and will still be ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in shoes, so I ordered a 9 in this slipper. However,they felt just a bit snug so I sent them back and ordered a 10. Love them! They are perfect and will still be great even if I have socks on. I would definitely recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: This has to be a fake, copy, knock off scruff slipper.
customer_reviews.text: Yuck! These are not lined with sheepskin fur rather some kind of polyester blend. Just not what I was expecting. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and have held up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I typically am a 7.5/8 and I purchased size 7 and once the fur matted down they fit perfectly and the soles have even held up well taking them outside to take out the trash or get the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Scruffy
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it slides off and you have to scuff around when u walk.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE MY UGG SLIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: I have thrown out all my old slippers since these arrived. These Ugg slippers are so soft and comfy and keep my feet warm. Durable and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: Lose their shape easily
customer_reviews.text: For the brand reputation and price point I expected a higher quality. After about 3 months the slippers start to lose their shape and the fur gets worn down inside. They look shabby. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Warm Nice Support too
customer_reviews.text: Daughter said, Soft and warm, keeps my feet warm and they are comfortable to wear, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great warm slipper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great warm slipper...have owned them before and these replaced my old ones...love them
customer_reviews.author: R.Lopez

customer_reviews.title: She loved em!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my girlfriend for her Birthday. She loved them. Great look, very comfortable, and the black and grey was a nice color. As for the sizing she is normally a 7" in sneakers so I got 7" in the slipper. They fit her right without socks on, somewhat small with socks. So if you are planning to wear socks I'd say go a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Ours Appear to be Fake
customer_reviews.text: The slippers didn't match the quality of UGG slippers my wife has purchased in the past. Upon closer inspection, the slippers don't read "UGG Australia" on the side, but rather "UGG". This, and the lower quality, lead me to believe these are fakes. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: chris falk

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of UGG slippers that looked like these years ago and they needed replacing so I purchased this pair. They are NOT the same slippers. The soles are not the same, they’re not warm like the original pair and I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful slippers! Just remember these are sized differently than your regular Uggs. Do not size down in these. I wear a size 8 in my Ugg boots, but wear size 9 in these. The size 8 would have been too small. I'm so glad I paid attention to some of the comments about sizing. These are so comfortable and luxurious feeling. They are worth their price!! love them..
customer_reviews.author: just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: No more cold feet
customer_reviews.text: Nothing says I love you more than your wife using your back as a heating pad when you least expect it. Now, her feet stay warm. Stylish too, though I maybe biased toward my wife.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: No cushion. No support. Worse than Uggs boots
customer_reviews.text: These are terribly uncomfortable. You may as well walk around with bare feet or socks on. I’m really irritated the Amazon changed me to send them back when they’re just not comfortable and terrible for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful comfy slippers year round.
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair, love these slippers. These are just a tiny bit longer than others, but not enough to be a problem. From Steve’s wife, they are aftersll ladies slippers🙂
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Love - (size up though)
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 9 (sometimes 8.5) in shoes but I actually got a 10 in these. I have wide feet. They seem more like 9.5 rather than a 10. Overall very comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my daughter. She loves them and they are her go to footwear when she is in her dorm! She says it’s like walking on clouds. She also has enough room to wear them with socks and lives that they have a shoe sole in case she needs to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Home for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I love cute and soft slippers. I wear a 9.5 so I bought a 10. However a 10 was too big. I gave them to my daughter, lucky her, and bought a 9 in the red with thick sole. I love those too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the wool on the heel wears down to slippers sole within a month of daily wear
customer_reviews.text: big surprise since the last pair of ugg slippers that i had never gave me this problem even after a year of wear..
customer_reviews.author: UraBoat

customer_reviews.title: These are her favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my wife. She loves slippers and has worn nearly every brand and style out there. She says these are by far her favorite. There is a nice sole on them, so if she steps outside in the morning while the ground is damp, her feet stay warm and dry. True to size, maybe a tiny bit small, but pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: They for perfect and are a little big for my mom
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy. A lot of posts said go order size up so I did that for my mom. Happens to be that a size up was my normal size, so i tried them on when they came. They for perfect and are a little big for my mom. So I would say these actually fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hava W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this type of UGG before and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers, actually I’m wearing them right now! After reading reviews, I did order up a size from my usual 9 and I’m glad I did. The fit is perfect and they are warm and cozy
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I adore these Ugg slippers. Talk about complete comfort. They fit perfectly and last. If you want a fantastic pair of slippers look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Tarra

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your wife.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these slippers. It was a great Christmas gift. She wears them all the time. They are good for temporarily walking outside to get the mail, pickup the trash, let our dog out, that type of thing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy; run a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I normally wear a 7.5 but have the 8. The slippers are a bit large but they are super cozy. I do have to be careful of the large lip around the toe of the slipper; it can catch on the carpet going up the steps, etc. I will use these slippers up and look for another UGG slipper when it's time to replace.
customer_reviews.author: JDSL

customer_reviews.title: Better options availableb
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a faithful UGG owner and never had any complaints, until now. While these are cute, they aren’t comfortable. I constantly feel like my foot is going to slide out of them when I wear them. It doesn’t help that they run small. I will stick to ordering the Ansley or Dakota!
customer_reviews.author: 68nova

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend for Chanukah, she loves them! Wears them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Possible FAKES
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this slipper for years. This pair is flimsy and falling apart after one wearing. Terrible. UGG is much better quality than this. Are these fakes?
customer_reviews.author: MAB68

customer_reviews.title: Defective slippers
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my mother as a gift. Wore for a day and the binding along the top of the shoe is already cracked, making it look like an old slipper, not a fresh new pair of uggs. I may have received a defective item, but I see others have had this issue as well, so I am not even sure if exchanging it is worth it at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, vibrant color, soft, hard sole for walking outside.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: These slippers do not disappoint! They are soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: These slippers do not disappoint! They are soft and fluffy. I wear a 7 or 7 1/2 shoe so I got the 8 and it's perfect. The rubber sole is much quieter than my old slippers. I got the Espresso color because I often eat and cook in my slippers and drip on them so hopefully stains won't show. This is my first pair of UGGs and my first slide-in slippers. The rubber sticks well to the floor or carpet for an easy slide in.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bowman

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Scuffette Ii Slipper
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep, Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia
Fur lined and collar with UGGpure wool insole
Molded rubber outsole. Natural wool footbed
Uggpure wool insole. Center seam at vamp with a round toe
